h1_title: How to Find All Purple Talisman Altars in Chapter 4
h2_title: How to Find the Purple Talismans in the Webbed Hollow
content: This will lead you to a courtyard, where the last altar and Talisman is. You'll hear someone shout "Run!" as you approach.
